title: Reflection
credit_line: Richard M. Scaife American Painting Fund
provenance_text:
Richard E. Miller [1875-1943]. Unidentified antiques dealer, Brookline, MA, by 1981[1]; Edward L. Shein, Seekonk, MA, by 1981; acquired by Vose Galleries of Boston, Boston, MA on September 8, 1981 until June 1982 [2]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute Pittsburgh, PA, June 1982. 

Notes:
[1]. This dealer is identified as being on Route 9 in Brookline, MA. See correspondence with Vose Galleries, dated April 18, 1987, in curatorial file.
[2]. Vose Galleries stock no. 26883. See  April 18, 1987 correspondence with Vose Galleries.
